articles.author: Colin Millar
articles.title: Man Utd takeover: Qatar bid dealt blow amid move to buy Spanish club and PSG stance - The Mirror
articles.description: Manchester United will listen to offers in a third round of bidding for the club as the Glazer ownership continues to assess their options amid interest from Qatar
articles.content:
The Qatari bid to Manchester United appears to have suffered a setback after the club confirmed a third round of bidding would be opened. 
 Qatari banker Sheikh Jassim bin Hamad Al Thani is heading … [+4547 chars]
